snippet.title: Smoke billowing from building in Coast CBD
snippet.content:
BREAKING: Smoke is billowing from shops in a Sunshine Coast CBD with firefighters currently arriving on scene.
The reported fire is located at 43 Duporth Avenue, Maroochydore.
A call was made to 000 about 6.08pm with Queensland Fire and Emergency Services responding.
Firefighters report smoke coming from a vacant building and are investigating.
